title: De Pfaffs
overview: In this reality series about the life of Jean-Marie Pfaff and his family camping there a camera crew at the famous family of Vlaanderen.Centraal The figure of Jean-Marie, it is the hub of the familie.Maar beside him there are natural yet his inseparable wife Carmen, his three daughters Debby, Kelly and Lyndsay, his father Edilbert 'Den Bompa', his son Sam Gooris and Nicolas, the friend of Kelly.
